name: Celyta Jackson

worksFor.name: Global Marketing & Communications
worksFor.description: Led international marketing strategy, representation offices, and multimillion-dollar partnerships across Latin America, Asia, and the Middle East.

worksFor.name: A Sanctuary Cafe
worksFor.description: Advised on concept development and brand strategy for a feline-focused hospitality venture.

worksFor.name: The Cat Cafe South Beach
worksFor.description: Founded and operated Miami Beach’s first cat café, blending hospitality, wellness, and animal adoption in a successful small-business model.

worksFor.name: NYC & Company (now New York City Tourism + Conventions)
worksFor.description: Directed global destination marketing campaigns, managed international trade shows such as IPW and World Travel Market, and built representation networks worldwide.

alumniOf.name: George Washington University – Elliott School of International Relations

description: Global marketing and communications executive with extensive expertise in tourism, hospitality, international trade shows, and pet industry consulting. Skilled in forging partnerships, managing large-scale events, and leading cross-cultural teams.
